snippet: The plan replaces a $17 billion bailout that was extended last year to help stabilize an economy reeling from political upheaval and a separatist uprising.
abstract: International Monetary Fund reaches agreement with Ukraine on $17.5 billion bailout to help stabilize its economy.
lead_paragraph: The plan replaces a $17 billion bailout that was extended last year to help stabilize an economy reeling from political upheaval and a separatist uprising.

headline.main: I.M.F. Announces $17.5 Billion Package to Help Kiev Stabilize Economy
headline.print_headline: I.M.F. Announces $17.5 Billion Package to Help Kiev Stabilize Economy
